g.text: results from the standard material. For a careful examination,
primary-ion beam was focused using an electron
neutralizer for charge compensation (net impact energy = 15
keV; beam current = 20 nA). The PL spectra were obtained
using a ﬂuorometer (FS-2 model, Scinco) with a xenon lamp
(150 W) under an operating voltage of 350 V. The diﬀuse
reﬂectance spectra were obtained using a UV
